description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Special traffic arrangement may be implemented at Lok Ma Chau Control Point
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 落馬洲管制站或會實施特別交通安排

2025-07-25T10:30:00.CONTENT_EN:
Special traffic arrangement may be implemented at Lok Ma Chau Control
Point on 27 July and 1 August 2025

Motorists are advised that, the number of cross-boundary private cars travelling to and from the Mainland via Lok Ma Chau Control Point may increase in the small hours of 27 July and 1 August 2025. Subject to actual traffic condition, special traffic arrangement may be implemented at the approaches to the Lok Ma Chau Control Point during the period concerned to allow smooth access of passenger service vehicles to above control point. Cross-boundary private cars are expected to take a longer time to pass through the control point. 

Motorists are advised to pay extra attention to the traffic management measures to be implemented by the Police on the approaches to the control point. They are also advised to be patient in case of traffic congestion, and follow the instructions of the Police. 
.
2025-07-25T10:30:00.CONTENT_CN:
落馬洲管制站在2025年7月27及8月1日或會實施特別交通安排

駕駛人士請注意，在2025年7月27及8月1日的凌晨時段經落馬洲管制站往來內地的跨境私家車或會增加。視乎現場交通情況，通往落馬洲管制站的道路在有關時段或會實施特別交通安排，以便公共運輸車輛能暢順地進入上述管制站。跨境私家車輪候通過口岸的時間預計會較長。

駕駛人士請特別留意警方在通往管制站的道路上實施的交通管理措施，如遇交通受阻，請保持忍讓及遵從警務人員的指示。
。

2025-07-25T19:40:00.CONTENT_EN: Red Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-25T19:40:00.CONTENT_CN: 紅色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。

2025-07-25T20:30:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-07-25T20:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2025-07-25T21:05:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR): The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR resumes to 100 km/h.
2025-07-25T21:05:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路最高車速限制恢復為每小時100 公里。

2025-07-27T13:36:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-07-27T13:36:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。
